mapper.select: SELECT A.pic pic, A.nm name, A.gender , A.birthdate, A.phone , A.address address , A.student_num studentNum, B.major_name majorName , A.created_at createdAt, A.email, sum(C.score) scoreStudent, B.graduation_score graduationScore , A.grade grade, C.isemester isemester, D.ilecture ilecture , A.student_num studentNum, C.avg_score avgScore, avg(C.rating) rating FROM student A INNER JOIN major B ON A.imajor = B.imajor INNER JOIN student_semester_score C ON A.istudent = C.istudent INNER JOIN lecture_student D ON A.istudent = D.istudent WHERE A.istudent = #{istudent}

SELECT DISTINCT C.grade grade , D.semester semester , C.avg_score avgScore, C.rating avgRating FROM student A INNER JOIN lecture_student B ON A.istudent = B.istudent INNER JOIN student_semester_score C ON B.istudent = C.istudent INNER JOIN semester D ON C.isemester = D.isemester
and A.student_num = #{studentNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student_semester_score (istudent, isemester, grade, score, avg_score, rating) SELECT #{istudent}, #{isemester}, A.grade, B.score, AVG(LS.total_score) AS avg_total_score, CASE WHEN AVG(LS.total_score) > 94 THEN 4.5 WHEN AVG(LS.total_score) >= 90 THEN 4.0 WHEN AVG(LS.total_score) > 84 THEN 3.5 WHEN AVG(LS.total_score) >= 80 THEN 3.0 WHEN AVG(LS.total_score) > 74 THEN 2.5 WHEN AVG(LS.total_score) >= 70 THEN 2.0 WHEN AVG(LS.total_score) > 64 THEN 1.5 WHEN AVG(LS.total_score) >= 60 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0 END rating FROM student A INNER JOIN lecture_name B ON B.ilecture_name = #{ilectureName} INNER JOIN lecture_student C ON A.istudent = C.istudent INNER JOIN student_semester_score D ON A.istudent = D.istudent INNER JOIN semester E ON D.isemester = E.isemester WHERE A.istudent = #{istudent} AND E.semester = #{semester};
mapper.update: UPDATE student_semester_score A INNER JOIN semester B ON A.isemester = B.isemester SET A.avg_score = (SELECT AVG(total_score) FROM lecture_student C INNER JOIN student_semester_score D on C.istudent = D.istudent INNER JOIN semester E ON D.isemester = E.isemester WHERE C.istudent = #{istudent} AND E.semester = #{semester}) , A.`rating` = CASE WHEN A.avg_score > 94 THEN 4.5 WHEN A.avg_score >= 90 THEN 4.0 WHEN A.avg_score > 84 THEN 3.5 WHEN A.avg_score >= 80 THEN 3.0 WHEN A.avg_score > 74 THEN 2.5 WHEN A.avg_score >= 70 THEN 2.0 WHEN A.avg_score > 64 THEN 1.5 WHEN A.avg_score >= 60 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0 END WHERE A.istudent = #{istudent} AND B.semester = #{semester};
